From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Double 
Punch/Injector/Bumblebee/Ares:




Dark One dived, dodging all nails and launching 25 rapid laser blasts at 
Torca.

---

Breakdown ducked down, a nail digging into him, but he ignored it.  He fired 
off a grenade at Torca's legs, followed by a sonic arc blast at Torca's left 
arm.

---

Pyro drove, the explosion of the missile sending shrapnel cutting into his 
side.  He fired off three fireballs at Sky Lynx, transforming to robot mode 
so he could get better maneuverability.

---

Hiss fired off a blast from his fusion cannon, blowing apart the last 
autogun, catching an EMP blast in the chest, falling to his back and going 
into stasis lock.

---

Scavenger caught the blade missile and fell back, firing off 25 rounds at 
Ratchet.

---

Demon Wulf took the missile and laughed at the dent in his armor, firing off 
three bolts from his palm and a blade missile at Sideswipe.

---

Flesh Ripper dodged one missile, 12 shots striking him.  He fired twenty-five 
rapid laser blasts at Sideswipe.

---

Dark Claw fired off two missiles at Orion.

---

Double Punch watched the missile hit no where near him, and returned fire at 
Orion with two energy-signature seeking missiles.

---

Injector fired off two stinger missiles to intercept an incoming missile, 
firing four stinger missiles at Orion from his other.

---

Bumblebee dodged the missile, but caught all of the blasts.  He fired off 
eight stinger missiles at Ratchet, four from each launcher.

---

Sixshot's ignored the blasts, but the missile rocked his form.  He fired off 
two powerful blasts at Torca.

---

Ares caught a missile in his current form, taking out one of his cannons.  He 
fired off twelve shots, four from each cannon, all heading for Sideswipe.
